details.description:
Myspace Exclusive!
One bedroom + Home office available with separate living room and kitchen in 1920s elevator prewar with live-in super.
Queen sized bedroom Full sized bedroom MASSIVE living room space Tons of light, exposed brick, updated modern bathroom, kingsize bedrooms; plenty of space for entertaining. Fabulous location just steps from Montrose L / Flushing JMZ trains and surrounded by tons of great bars, restaurants; shopping. Short commute to Manhattan!
June 1 move in No broker fee Heat; hot water included Small pets welcome

Myspace Exclusive! Beautiful apartment in Williamsburg, prime location!
This 2 bedroom apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby?s All Right, Patrizia?s, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Only # blocks from the L train, and a # minute walk to the JMZ trains
June 1 move in Small pets welcome No broker fee

Huge pre-war 1 bedroom!
- rent stabilized
1 large bedroom 1 big living room (with windows) Renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances Elevator building Heat and hot water included
Small pets OK Available June 1 Broker fee applies

Beautiful Williamsburg apartment is available May 1st!
- 1 big bedroom - Real living room that fits a sofa /tv/coffee table and has natural light - Separate kitchen with full sized appliances - Exposed brick
ELEVATOR BUILDING!
Because this property is in a prime location, you will be conveniently close to the J, M, and G trains! You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby?s All Right, Patrizia?s, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Small pets only 5/1 move in No broker fee

MySpace exclusive!
Spacious one bedroom in well maintained pre war building in Williamsburg. Large living room perfect for entertaining. Updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Short walk to the J,M,G and L trains. Super easy to get anywhere! Pies-n-Thighs, The Rosemont, Testo, Align Coffee, Williamsburg Pizza, Modern Love Vega, etc all nearby. Incredible Williamsburg location.
Available 5/1 Small pets OK No broker fee

Myspace Exclusive!
One bedroom with separate living room and kitchen in 1920s elevator prewar with live-in super.
- Queen sized bedroom - Big living room space - Tons of light, exposed brick, updated modern bathroom, kingsize bedrooms; plenty of space for entertaining.
Fabulous location just steps from Montrose L / Flushing JMZ trains and surrounded by tons of great bars, restaurants; shopping. Short commute to Manhattan!
June 1 move in No broker fee Heat; hot water included Small pets welcome

Myspace Exclusive!
1 bedroom layout with extra office! Stainless steel appliances, eat in kitchen. Nice layout!
The building is an extremely well-maintained 1920s prewar featuring stainless appliances, hardwood floors, tons of sunlight, high ceilings and lots of space. Pet friendly, heat; hot water included!
Call today, as this listing will not last.
June 1st move in Small pets OK No broker fee

New 1 bedroom!
Awesome location, right off the 2.3.5 trains!
Heat/Hot water included Separate Kitchen area Spacious Living room King Bedroom S/S appliances, Wood flooring Windows/Closets Live in Super
Available June 1! Small pets OK

Large 2BR with queen size rooms, large balcony and huge PRIVATE roof deck and private balcony. Common area big enough for a couch, tv and dining table. The unit features stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave, hardwood floor, white tile kitchen backsplash and bathroom, individual a/c units in each room. Spiral staircase to a small room which opens to your own private roof deck. The building features an elevator, laundry room, roof deck, zip car, security system, and is located in the center of Bushwick!
Building also features 2 large shared roof decks and a laundry room. Parking and zip car services available. Elevator
1/2 a block from the Dekalb L and 5min walk to the M train. NO fee
Call or text to take a look right away!

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Private Roof Deck

details.description:
77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Central A/C

details.description:
Discover this exquisite 2-bedroom, 1-bath building in Williamsburg!
Unit features: -Enjoy lofty ceilings, expansive windows, and polished hardwood floors - Delight in a gourmet kitchen with top-tier appliances -Relax in the spa-inspired bathroom
Enjoy building perks: -Cutting-edge gym -Elevator convenience -Relaxing sauna -Entertaining game room -Rooftop oasis with panoramic city vistas
Book your tour now and bask in the brilliance of this upscale abode!

This building is arguably THE MOST desirable neighborhood in Brooklyn. Right on the Williamsburg Waterfront with gorgeous river and city views, all the restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art and music venues, plant shops, parks, farmers markets, grocers, and absolutely anything and everything else you could desire right outside your door. Be warned: the luxury experience you are offered inside the building may leave you feeling torn about whether to go out and enjoy the bustle of the neighborhood or stay in and enjoy your own amenities right here at home!Conveniently located off the J. M, and L trains, as well as the B32, B62, and Q59 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher Central A/C and Heat Private Balcony Excellent light from extra large windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Bike Room Courtyard Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Package Room Finished Roof Deck First; Security NO FEE

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Central A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Private Outdoor Space, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
BRAND NEW LUXURY BUILDING in the beautiful Vinegar Hill area of DUMBO!! Enjoy unbelievable views across both the Manhattan Bridge and Brooklyn Bridge. Visit the countless parks nearby such as John St Park, Main St Park, Trinity Park, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Cadman Plaza Park, Whitman Park and even more! Become a patron of some of the long standing and delicious LOCAL local restaurants such as Bridge Coffee and still enjoy those late night cravings spots we pretend we don't know and love (*cough Shake Shack) just a few blocks further. Take a little old school Brooklyn, mix in some new luxury living, and that's how you'll end up falling in love with your new home here!
Conveniently located off the A, C and F trains as well as the B57, B62, B69 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher; Microwave Central A/C; Heat Inquire for Private Balconies! Inquire for IN UNIT laundry!
BUILDING FEATURES: Courtyard Roof Deck Elevator Laundry Room Fitness Center Rec Room Tenant Lounge Package Room Bike Storage Pets Allowed
First; Security NO BROKER FEE!

amenities.other: Central A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
The perfect spot for a central Williamsburg vibe in a slightly quieter area! Don't worry though, that busy waterfront is only a short walk away :) Find all the restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art and music venues, plant shops, parks, farmers markets, grocers, and absolutely anything and everything else you could desire right outside your door. East Williamsburg is still an amazing, diverse, and community-centered neighborhood with great accessibility to almost any other Brooklyn area and a very easy commute to Manhattan. Conveniently located off the L, J. M, and G trains, as well as the B43, B46, B48, and B60 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Central A/C and Heat
BUILDING FEATURES: Laundry Room Finished Roof Deck

NOW WITH NO BROKER FEE!!

details.description: Virtual tours available!Do not miss out on this 2 bed / 1 bath apartment in Brooklyn's up and coming neighborhood Prospect Lefferts Gardens! People forget that Brooklyn is the biggest borough and offers some of the best, historic architecture. Enjoy the neighborhood's easy access to the B,Q,2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and short walk to Prospect Park. Live within steps to juice bars, grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, bars, pharmacies, banks, local bakeries, and more to explore. Brooklyn Greenery, MIdwood Flats, Irv's, Bluebird, Blessings, and Food Sermon are just a couple of the many options to check out in this vibrant neighborhood.Easy commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

details.description:
It sounds like you've found an incredible space in Gowanus! This large 2-bedroom duplex w/ basement with a back deck. Let's dive into the details:
This duplex boasts two levels of spacious living:
Upstairs, you'll find two well-appointed bedrooms, each with its own closet, alongside an open kitchen/living area and a full bathroom. Downstairs, the large basement offers two additional rooms and a convenient half bath, along with the added bonus of a back deck! The apartment is equipped with central A/C and heat, a dishwasher, and shared laundry facilities for added convenience.
Nestled between 3rd and 4th Aves in Gowanus, the location couldn't be more convenient. Just steps from the Union Street R station, with easy access to Atlantic Ave-Barclays (2/3/4/5/B/D/N/Q/R) and Bergen; Carroll St (F/G) stations, commuting is a breeze. Plus, you'll have a wealth of shops, restaurants, and bars right at your doorstep.
This duplex offers the perfect blend of space, comfort, and convenience. Don't miss out?schedule a viewing today!

Renovated 2 bedroom in SOHO!
2 bedrooms 1 bath Hardwood floors Exposed brick Stainless steel appliances Heat included
Available Now Broker fee applies
